paper_metadata.extraction_summary: Extracted genetic variant information for the BRCA2 gene, including penetrance data.

patients.demographics: Average age 46.47 years, predominantly female, Pakhtun ethnicity

individual_records.evidence_sentence: The BRCA2 gene had 2 frameshift deletions while 25 nonsynonymous single nucleotide variants.

functional_data.summary: The mutations were predicted to be deleterious based on SIFT and PolyPhen-2.

variants.evidence_level: Strong evidence based on multiple prediction tools.
variants.additional_notes: The BRCA2 gene was found to carry excessive mutations compared to BRCA1.
key_quotes: The BRCA2 gene had 2 frameshift deletions while 25 nonsynonymous single nucleotide variants.
The present study reveals unique BRCA1 and BRCA2 mutations in Pakhtun population.
